panel.title: Concerts Affected

search.query: |inputlookup ticketpurchase.csv | stats count by status

panel.title: Shazams vs Number of Livestreams Watched

search.query: sourcetype="shazam_json" category=MUSIC | timechart span=1d count as total_shazams | append [|inputlookup livestreams.csv | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time | timechart span=1d count as total_livestreams]

panel.title: Time Spent Watching Livestreams vs Attending Concerts from March to May 2018 to 2020

search.query: |inputlookup livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |fields artist,watch_date,stream_length | stats sum(stream_length) as length, values(artist) as artists by watch_date | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time | append [|inputlookup concerthistoryparse.csv | eval length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | fields headliner,date,length | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time] | fields length,_time | timechart sum(length) as length span=1d |timewrap 3m | fields _time,length_latest_3months,length_12months_before,length_24months_before | rename length_latest_3months AS shelter_in_place, length_12months_before AS march_to_may_2019, length_24months_before AS march_to_may_2018

panel.title: Hourly Listening Habits Between April 1 - April 14 2020

search.query: `lastfm` |timechart count span=1h

panel.title: All Listening Habits Per Day Since March 10, 2020

search.query: |inputlookup livestreams.csv |fields artist,watch_date,stream_length | stats count by watch_date | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time | search _time>1583798400 | append [|inputlookup concerthistoryparse.csv |stats count by date | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | search _time>1583798400] |append [|search `lastfm` | timechart count span=1d] | timechart sum(count) as total_listens span=1d

panel.title: What Happened to My Live Music Calendar

search.query: |inputlookup ticketpurchase.csv | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(orig_concert_date) AS _time | eval status="concert ".status | timechart count by status span=1d |append [|inputlookup livestreams.csv | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time | timechart count as "livestreams watched" span=1d]

panel.title: Daily Listening Habits: March-August in 2018, 2019, 2020

search.query: `lastfm` |timechart span=1mon count by date_wday | where (strftime(_time, "%m")=="03" OR strftime(_time, "%m")=="04" OR strftime(_time, "%m")=="05" OR strftime(_time, "%m")=="06" OR strftime(_time, "%m")=="07" OR strftime(_time, "%m")=="08")

panel.title: Amount of Time Spent Listening, March - May in 2018, 2019, and 2020

search.query: `lastfm` | timechart count as listen span=1d | eval listen_length=(listen*240) | inputlookup append=t livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(listen_length,stream_length,show_length)/60) | timechart sum(length) as length span=1w |timewrap 3m | fields _time,length_latest_3months,length_12months_before,length_24months_before | rename length_latest_3months AS shelter_in_place, length_12months_before AS march_to_may_2019, length_24months_before AS march_to_may_2018

panel.title: Number of Listens for Livestream Artists

search.query: `lastfm` | stats count by artist | lookup livestreams.csv artist | search where_watched=* | fields artist,count | sort -count

panel.title: Music Discovery in March, April, May 2018-2020

search.query: `lastfm_earliest` |search earliestyear IN (2020,2019,2018) | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m") | stats count by artist,month,earliestyear | stats min(month) as earliest_month by artist,earliestyear | search earliest_month IN (3,4,5) | eval when=earliest_month." ".earliestyear | stats count by earliestyear | delta count as discovery | eval percentage_growth=round((discovery*100)/(count-discovery),2) | fields earliestyear,count | rename count as artists_discovered,earliestyear as year_discovered

panel.title: LastFM Listens Year Over Year from 2018 to 2020 during March, April, May

search.query: `lastfm` | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | stats count by month,year | search month IN (3,4,5) | stats sum(count) as listens by year | search year IN (2018,2019,2020) | delta listens AS change | eval percentage_growth=round((change*100)/(listens-change),2) | fields year listens percentage_growth

panel.title: Total Duration of Listens Over Time: Music, Livestreams, and Concerts in March, April, and May Year over Year

search.query: `lastfm` | timechart count as listen span=1mon | eval listen_length=(listen*240) | inputlookup append=t livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time | inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(listen_length,stream_length,show_length)/60) | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | search month IN (3,4,5) | search year IN (2018,2019,2020) | stats sum(length) as length by year | streamstats window=2 range(length) as change | eval percentage_growth=round((change*100)/(length-change),2) | fields year,length,percentage_growth

panel.title: Time Spent at Concerts and Watching Livestreams in March, April, and May in 2017, 2018, 2019, and 2020

search.query: | inputlookup livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(stream_length,show_length)/60) | eval type=case(isnotnull(stream_length), "livestream", isnotnull(show_length), "concert") | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") |eval artist=coalesce(artist,headliner) | search month IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) | search year IN (2017,2018,2019,2020) | timechart span=1y sum(length) as total_minutes_listened by type

panel.title: Number of Shows Attended and Number of Livestreams Watched in March, April, May in 2017., 2018, 2019, 2020

search.query: | inputlookup livestreams.csv |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | eval type=if(isnotnull(headliner),"concert", "livestream") | search month IN (3,4,5) | search year IN (2017,2018,2019,2020) | timechart span=1y count by type

panel.title: Weekend and Weekday LastFM Listening Patterns in March - August in 2017,.2018,2019,2020

search.query: `lastfm` | eval day_of_week = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | search month IN (3,4,5,6,7,8) | search year IN (2017,2018,2019,2020) | eval type=if(searchmatch("day_of_week=saturday OR day_of_week=sunday"),"weekend","weekday") | timechart span=1y count by type

panel.title: Time Spent Listening to Livestreams, Concerts, and Music by Weekend or Weekday (in March - August in 2017,2018,2019,2020)

search.query: `lastfm` | timechart count as listen span=1mon | eval listen_length=(listen*240) | inputlookup append=t livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(listen_length,stream_length,show_length)/60) | eval type=case(isnotnull(stream_length), "livestream", isnotnull(listen_length), "track listen", isnotnull(show_length), "concert") | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | eval day_of_week = lower(strftime(_time, "%A")) | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | eval week_type=if(searchmatch("day_of_week=saturday OR day_of_week=sunday"),"weekend","weekday") | search month IN (2,3,4,5,6,7,8) | search year IN (2017,2018,2019,2020) | timechart span=1y sum(length) as total_minutes_listened by week_type

panel.title: Number of Livestreams above (WATCH) and below (SKIP) my arbitrary artist threshold

search.query: `lastfm` | stats count by artist | lookup livestreams.csv artist | search where_watched=* | fields artist,count | sort -count | inputlookup append=t artistthreshold.csv | eventstats list(threshold) as threshold | eval status=case('count' >= 'threshold', "WATCH", 'count' < 'threshold', "SKIP") | stats count by status

panel.title: Artists that I've seen Live but Also Livestreamed

search.query: |inputlookup concerts.csv | makemv artist delim="," | mvexpand artist | lookup livestreams.csv artist | eval have_streamed=if(isnotnull(venue) AND isnotnull(where_watched), "yes","no") | stats count by have_streamed

panel.title: Music Listening Habits by Amount of Time Listened Compared with Important Pandemic Dates

search.query: `lastfm` | timechart count as listen span=1d | eval listen_length=(listen*240) | inputlookup append=t livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(listen_length,stream_length,show_length)/60) | eval year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | search year IN (2020) | timechart sum(length) as length span=1d
| inputlookup sip_dates.csv | eval _time=strptime(date, "%B %d %Y") | eval annotation_label=date.": ".what

panel.title: Livestream Count by Where I Watched Them

search.query: | inputlookup livestreams.csv | stats count by where_watched | sort -count

panel.title: Total Time in Minutes by Where I Watched Livestreams

search.query: | inputlookup livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length | eval minutes_spent=round(stream_length/60) | stats sum(minutes_spent) as total_mins_spent by where_watched | sort -total_mins_spent

panel.title: Top 20 Artists Overall by Amount Listened

search.query: `lastfm` | stats count as listen by artist | eval listen_length=(listen*240) | inputlookup append=t livestreams.csv | convert dur2sec(length) as stream_length |convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(watch_date) AS _time |inputlookup append=t concerthistoryparse.csv | eval show_length=case(info == "festival", "28800", info == "dj set", "14400", info == "concert", "10800") | convert timeformat="%B %d %Y" mktime(date) AS _time | eval length=round(coalesce(listen_length,stream_length,show_length)/60) | stats sum(length) as length by artist | sort -length

panel.title: Comparing Avg of Previous 10 years with this year march april and may

search.query: `lastfm` | fields _time | eval month=strftime(_time, "%-m"), year=strftime(_time, "%Y") | search month IN (3,4,5) | stats count by year | eval earlier=if(year!=2020, count, 0) | eventstats avg(earlier) as avg_before | fields year,count,avg_before | search (year=2020) OR year=2019 | eval number_of_listens=if(year=2019, avg_before, count), year=if(year=2019, "2010-2019", "2020") | fields year,number_of_listens
